  • Constructor Details

    • CombatZoneFinal

      public CombatZoneFinal(Card_Combat_zone cardC, FlightBoard flightBoard) throws Exception
      Constructor for the CombatZoneFinal class. Represents the final state of a card in the combat zone, initiating the surrender timer and updating the game's state to reflect the transition to the COMBAT_ZONE_FINAL state.
      Parameters:
      cardC - The combat zone card associated with this state. Represents the specific card whose state is being transitioned.
      flightBoard - The flight board associated with the game, used for managing the game's progression and interactions.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the initialization of the combat zone state or the game's state transition.
